hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOLS.EOLS_ID, EOLS.CREATOR, EOLS.CREATE_TIME, EOLS.MODIFIER, EOLS.MODIFY_TIME, EOLS.REC_VER, EOLS.REC_STATUS, EOLS.EOLS_STATUS, EOLS.PM_CODE, EOLS.EOLS_NAME, EOLS.EOLS_REMARK, EOLS.EOLS_PRIORITY, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_CREATOR_NAME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_MODIFIER_NAME FROM EO_LCL_STRATEGY EOLS LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EOLS.CREATOR = ESUS.ESUS_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EOLS.MODIFIER = ESUSM.ESUS_ID WHERE 1=1 AND EOLS.REC_STATUS = 0 <<AND EOLS.EOLS_STATUS = :eolsStatus>> <<AND EOLS.PM_CODE = :pmCode>> <<AND EOLS.EOLS_NAME LIKE :eolsName>> <<AND EOLS.EOLS_PRIORITY = :eolsPriority>> order by EOLS.EOLS_PRIORITY asc
